name: Just Another Day (Ludum Dare #40)
description:
Ludum Dare 40 Jam Entry for theme "The more you have, the worse it is"
Vote: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/just-another-day

Just Another Day in the life of an overworked, underpayed call center operator.

Quickly answer those calls but be aware that customers will rate you on your performance. Get enough bad reviews and your boss will not be happy.

Controls:
Mouse - Look Around
Left Click - Interact
Right Click - Zoom
Escape - Quit

Bug Fixes
- Dialogue was getting stuck in an infinite loop. (breaking game.)

Created by @DraperDanMan & @Villa
